item.description:
Hello all!

Please note that I have changed the start time for this Pawty to 1:00 PM!! The pawty goes until "whenever".

Also, FYI... there aren't going to be any raffles or collections for shelters at this Pawty... just come for fun! If you're so inclined, you can bring some kind of "goodie" to share.

I know I said I would be scheduling June's meetup at Bradley Palmer State Park in Topsfield, MA, but the Friends Of Cavaliers (FOC) group is having their Pawty this month, so we'll be joining them instead! If you attended the Holiday Pawty in December, you know what a BLAST this was and won't want to miss this event! There are more Cavaliers there than you have probably ever met in your life! :)

If you want to join the FOC group, go to: http://pets.groups.ya... (though it's not necessary to join to attend the pawty).

Thanks!
-laura

group.name: Cavalier King Charles Spaniel Lovers of MA

item.name: NSCKCS June Meetup / FOC Pawty
